<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Anadi Elder](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1424)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Anadi elders help guide their kin and must make difficult decisions for their people, such as whether to continue hostile negotiations or to escalate a disagreement to outright conflict.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 24

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Anadi Elder](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1424)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="CG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Anadi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=255" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 291 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Pathfinder #145: Hellknight Hill](/Sources.aspx?ID=4) pg. 85</row>

**Perception** +15

**Languages**
[Anadi](/Languages.aspx?ID=46), [Mwangi](/Languages.aspx?ID=39)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +15, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +13, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +13, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +11, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +15, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +11, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +0

**Int** +1

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Composite Longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74) (20 arrows), [Hide Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7), [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 23 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +17 

</row>

**HP** 95

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, climb 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortsword +15 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 2d6+6 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +16 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 2d6+6 piercing plus anadi venom

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
composite longbow +16 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)),
**Damage** 1d8+1 piercing

**Arcane Innate Spells** DC 24, attack +16
- **Cantrips (3rd)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Electric Arc](/Spells.aspx?ID=97), [Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190)
- **1st**
[Color Spray](/Spells.aspx?ID=44), [Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159), [Illusory Object](/Spells.aspx?ID=160)
- **2nd**
[Blur](/Spells.aspx?ID=28), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197)
- **3rd**
[Hypnotic Pattern](/Spells.aspx?ID=157), [Invisibility Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=165)

**Anadi Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 22 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 2d6 poison damage and [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) (1 round); **Stage 2** 2d6 poison damage, flat-footed, and [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) (1 round)

**[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The anadi changes into their hybrid form, spider form, or human form. The above statistics assume the anadi is in their hybrid form. While in their human form, the anadi hunter can't use their fangs attack and loses their climb Speed. When in spider form, they can't use weapons.

**Spin Silk**  ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Exploration](/Traits.aspx?ID=66), [Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) By spending several minutes, an anadi can produce silk to craft items made of cloth. A single anadi can produce enough silk in a day to craft a single garment.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-107" />
